name: PAPER IN DANGER
description:
Ready to save a piece of A4 paper? 

Inspired by the Chifumi, try to climb to the top of the sheet of paper: slide between the pairs of scissors, equip yourself with power-ups, never forget your fragility... 

But... be warned: once you start, there's no stopping you!

Features:

- A multitude of characters: Cool wool, Ginger tiger, Pearl girl...

And worlds: Night Night, Rage Journal, Secret Diary! 

- Pick up great upgrades: INVINCIBILITY, SLOW MOTION...

- Avoid formidable obstacles: PAIRS OF SCISSORS, CIRCULAR SAW... 

- A climb full of surprises: between those that cut, move, or disappear, those that break and those that explode... 

How to play:

Slide your finger on the screen to move your character from left to right, or use the left and right tap. 

* WARNING: INCREDIBLY addictive game!

** NO this is not a game about ecology.

BY AUDREY MALUGANI & VALENTIN DENEAU
